name: Golf Pro Free
description:
Welcome to the only high quality golf game on Apple TV.

Full support for the Siri Remote, lets you hit the ball using a real swing, and spin it in mid air. Challenge yourself or play with your friends. Up to 4 players.

18 beautifully designed holes, inspired by the most famous golf courses in the world.

Playing instructions:
• Start your swing by pointing the Siri remote down, like when you start a real golf swing. The club will then align to the ball. Then hit the ball by making a real golf swing
• Spin the ball by tilting the remote when the ball is in the air. Forward, back, left and right are all possible
• Swipe up and down to change club

• Press the touch surface to fly up and get an overview.

Happy golfing! Please contact us with your feedback at golfpro2016@inlovewith.com We will reply to everyone, and are looking forward to hearing from you!
